story_arceus_07_05000/2401_1001_0100_10: Tell me, how go our latest schemes?
story_arceus_07_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
As for kidnapping spectators who have
connections to the sync stones ultimate—
and taking Professor Oak hostage...
story_arceus_07_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
*chuckle*
The arena will fall into chaos, I’m sure.
story_arceus_07_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Well. We can’t let this opportunity go to
waste, can we?
